# Testing

## Commandment
>Thou shalt always test before committing

## Types of tests
>- Unit
>- Functional
>- User
>- Smoke test
>- Reconciliation

## Unit testing
Test discrete bits of code

- Success
- Errors
- Warnings
- Edge cases
- Bugs
